Package Model

Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
Model.GameObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Box, Bullet, Coin, DamageObstacle, Dante, Door, EndBoss, Enemy, InGameDialog, Miniboss, ShotEnemy, SmartEnemy
public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Abstract class from which every kind of object in the game extends from. It is used as a template for every object.
See Also:
Serialized Form
